snippet.title: Natsu no Sagashimono ~What We Found That Summer~ - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
During summer, Natsu spends a month with his aunt in a quiet, country town. Have a fun time fishing, catching bugs, exploring the sights, and collecting other items as you go around talking to the people in town in this relaxing summer-themed RPG!

Natsu no Sagashimono ~What We Found That Summer~ on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/natsu-no-sagashimono-what-we-found-that-summer/

Natsu no Sagashimono ~What We Found That Summer~ on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2997980/Natsu_no_Sagashimono_What_We_Found_That_Summer/
